summary: A retiree battles to obtain his rightfully due pension.
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Yolande Moreau|Isabelle Adjani|Miss Ming|Benoît Poelvoorde|Bouli Lanners|Catherine Hosmalin|Blutch|Philippe Nahon|Anna Mouglalis|Albert Delpy|Bruno Lochet|Rémy Roubakha|Joseph Dahan|Gustave Kervern|Stéphanie Pillonca|Jawad Enejjaz|Remy Kolpa|Siné|Paulo Anarkao|Céline Richeboeuf|Aurélie Brin|Bernard Geoffroy|Dick Annegarn|Marie-Claude Pluviaud|Eric Monfourny|Noël Godin|David Pougnaud-Barillon|Serge Nuques|Zoé Weber|Cédric Geoffroy|Dodo Avrel|Sophie Seugé
director: Directors: Benoît Delépine, Gustave Kervern (as Gustave de Kervern)
title: Mammuth
